data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shi, Hongliang, Casale, Achille (2018): Revision of the Oriental species of Calleida Latreille (sensu lato). Part 2: the C. discoidalis species group (Coleoptera, Carabidae, Lebiini). ZooKeys 806: 87-120, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.806.30051, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.806.30051
